== Description ==
Goes through an array and changes the keys to all lower case.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_kses_array_lc( $inarray ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$inarray|array|Unfiltered array}}

== Return Values ==
; (array) : Fixed array with all lowercase keys

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* This function expects a multi-dimensional array for input.

Since: 1.0.0

<tt>wp_kses_array_lc()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/kses.php}}.
